location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains copies of two letters, both dated 27 January 1945. The first is from Frederick James Wakelin, Director of Education in Bahrain, and constitutes a request for paper. The second is the reply from Major Tom Hickinbotham, the Political Agent in Bahrain, expressing regret for not being to provide any paper.Folio 4 is internal office notes.
